name: GDDP Integration
description: Adds a new Menu for GDDP Progression

issues.info: Submit problems to the GitHub or @minemaker0430 on Discord.

unlock-all-tiers.name: Unlock All Tiers
unlock-all-tiers.description: Disables the Locked Tiers so you can Jump Difficulties to your heart's content.

unlock-all-legacy.name: Unlock All Legacy Packs
unlock-all-legacy.description: Disables Legacy Packs being Locked behind Main Packs.

enable-practice.name: Enable Practice Packs
enable-practice.description: Adds Practice versions of the Main Packs to help you practice Main Tier levels.

enable-cache.name: Enable Cache
enable-cache.description: Saves previous database data. Updates to previously existing data may take longer.

show-outside-menus.name: Show Faces Outside Menus
show-outside-menus.description: Makes Custom Difficulty Faces no longer require GDDP Menus to activate.

skillset-badges.name: Enable Skillset Badges
skillset-badges.description: Enables Skillset Badges next to the difficulty faces.

alt-button-texture.name: Alternate Button Texture
alt-button-texture.description: Changes the menu button to something less nightmarish.

compact-button.name: Compact Menu Button
compact-button.description: Changes the menu button to a Circle Button rather than a typical Creator Menu Button.

replace-map-packs.name: Replace Map Packs
replace-map-packs.description: Replaces the Map Packs button with the Demon Progression button.

show-database-version.name: Show Database Version
show-database-version.description: Shows what version of the database you're currently on.

restore-bg-color.name: Vanilla Background Color
restore-bg-color.description: Changes the background color in the GDDP Menus to the Vanilla Color.

custom-difficulty-faces.name: Custom Difficulty Faces
custom-difficulty-faces.description: Shows custom difficulty faces in the GDDP Menus.

all-demons-rated.name: Rate All Demons
all-demons-rated.description:
Shows custom difficulty faces on all rated demons. <cr>Requires "Show Faces Outside Menus".</c> 

(Option created by wint0r)

replace-epic.name: Replace Epic Fire
replace-epic.description: Replaces the Epic fire with the Plus fire in the GDDP Menus.

override-ratings.name: Plus Tier Override
override-ratings.description: Ratings will always show the Plus fire in the GDDP Menus when in a Plus Tier.

show-skills-in-list.name: Show Skills in List
show-skills-in-list.description: If disabled, Skillsets will only be shown on the Level Page.

override-grandpa-demon.name: Override Grandpa Demon
override-grandpa-demon.description: Overrides the custom Grandpa Demon Difficulty Faces in the GDDP Menus.

disable-grandpa-demon-effects.name: Disable Grandpa Demon Effects
disable-grandpa-demon-effects.description: Disables the Grandpa Demon background effects in the GDDP Menus.

dont-move-side-btns.name: Don't Move Side Buttons
dont-move-side-btns.description: Disables moving the Side Buttons from BetterInfo and GDRoulette.
